text: Edgar (c. 1074 – 8 January 1107), ruled over Scotland from 1097 to 1107. He was the fourth son of Malcolm III and Margaret of Wessex.Oram, Richard, The Canmores: Kings & Queens of the Scots 1040–1290. Tempus, Stroud, 2002. Donald III was his uncle and Duncan II was his half-brother. His brother Alexander I became king after his death. ==References== Category:Kings and Queens of Scotland Category:1070s births Category:1107 deaths Category:11th century in Scotland Category:12th century in Scotland
title: Edgar, King of Scotland
